title: Sunset Park
description: A peaceful park with scenic sunset views and walking trails.

title: City Museum
description: Explore the rich history and culture of the region.

title: Downtown Market
description: Local produce, crafts, and weekend music performances.

title: Riverwalk Trail
description: A scenic trail along the river, ideal for biking and jogging.

title: Art Center
description: Workshops, exhibitions, and community art projects.

title: Tech Innovation Hub
description: Home to startups and tech companies promoting innovation.

title: Green Valley Winery
description: Award-winning local wines and scenic vineyard tours.

title: Skyline Tower
description: The tallest building in the area with an observation deck.
